description: This file configures ESLint for a Vue.js project using TypeScript. It imports various plugins and configurations, defines which files to lint or ignore, and combines these settings into a default export using a custom configuration function.

methods.name: defineConfigWithVueTs
methods.description: A function to define an ESLint configuration with Vue TypeScript integration.

methods.name: vueTsConfigs.recommended
methods.description: An object containing recommended ESLint configurations for Vue with TypeScript.
